title: Cross your fingers: Powerball climbs to $1.6 billion, setting all-time record for Saturday drawing
dc:creator: Nathan Solis
description: The Powerball jackpot for Saturday climbs to a record-high $1.6 billion. The odds of winning are 1 in 300 million.
content:encoded: The Powerball jackpot for Saturday climbs to a record-high $1.6 billion. The odds of winning are 1 in 300 million.

media:content.media:description: HAWTHORNE, CA - NOVEMBER 4, 2022 - - Realtor Alicia Sanchez, holds her dog Kiki and $200 worth of Powerball lottery tickets that she and her colleagues at work purchased for at Bluebird Liquor in Hawthorne on November 4, 2022. Sanchez said if she wins she's going to give it to a women's shelter and to other needy charities. Powerball's jackpot is $1.6 billion, the largest lottery prize ever. Bluebird Liquor is well known for paying out lucky winners. (Genaro Molina / Los Angeles Times)
